name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Boil the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
In a pan, sauté the onion and garlic.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in the tomatoes and simmer for 20 minutes.
Serve the sauce over the spaghetti.

name: Chicken Curry
description: A flavorful chicken curry with a spicy kick.
instructions: Sauté the onion until soft.
Add the chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in the curry powder and cook for 1 minute.
Add the coconut milk and simmer for 15 minutes.
Add the bell pepper and cook for 5 more minutes.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
description: A quick and healthy vegetable stir-fry.
instructions: Heat olive oil in a wok.
Add carrots and stir-fry for 2 minutes.
Add broccoli and stir-fry for another 3 minutes.
Stir in the bell pepper and soy sauce.
Cook for another 2 minutes and serve.

name: Beef Stroganoff
description: A creamy beef and mushroom dish.
instructions: Sear the beef strips in a pan until browned.
Remove the beef and sauté the onion and mushrooms.
Add the flour and cook for 1 minute.
Stir in the sour cream and bring to a simmer.
Return the beef to the pan and cook for 5 minutes.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Classic cookies with gooey chocolate chips.
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cream together butter and sugar.
Mix in the egg and flour.
Fold in the chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet and bake for 12-15 minutes.

name: Caesar Salad
description: A fresh and tangy Caesar salad.
instructions: In a large bowl, combine lettuce, croutons, and parmesan cheese.
Add Caesar dressing and toss to coat.
Top with sliced grilled chicken.
Serve immediately.

name: Margarita Pizza
description: A simple and classic pizza with fresh ingredients.
instructions: Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F).
Spread tomato sauce over the pizza base.
Top with mozzarella cheese and fresh basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil.
Bake in the oven for 12-15 minutes.

name: Pancakes
description: Light and fluffy pancakes for breakfast.
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder in a bowl.
Whisk in the egg and milk until smooth.
Heat a non-stick pan and pour in batter to form pancakes.
Cook until bubbles appear, then flip and cook the other side.
Serve with syrup or fresh fruit.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: A healthy and delicious grilled salmon dish.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Brush salmon fillets with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Grill salmon for 5-7 minutes per side.
Serve with lemon slices and garnish with fresh dill.

name: Minestrone Soup
instructions: Sauté onion, carrots, and celery in a large pot.
Add canned tomatoes and vegetable stock.
Simmer for 20 minutes.
Add pasta and cook until tender.
Serve hot with grated parmesan cheese.
